Description.Name: ArchAngel
Description.Details: Eli Potter was born shipside on board a passenger liner moments before pirates attacked in the Deep Periphery. Raised a captive, Eli soon proved his worth piloting fankenmechs in the pirates' own coliseum and became trusted enough to pilot a mech on raids. One such raid provided the opportunity to escape, and Eli disappeared for nearly a decade before returning at the head of the newly formed Winged Lancers. Eli is currently on hiatus from the Lancers searching for a mech stolen from him, the Ebon Legatus, entrusting their welfare to a mysterius figure known simply as Hunter... COMMUNITY CONTENT
